definition: surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)

sentences.english: Nan Song Dynasty is an important period in development of suites of poems on history after Wan Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南宋是繼晚唐之後詠史組詩發展的又一重要時期。

sentences.english: The Ci poem writer Han Yuanji and his son Han Biao were effective litterateurs at Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 韓元吉和韓淲是南宋詞壇的一對父子作家。

sentences.english: Lu You was a famous patriotic poet in the Southern Song Dyansty .
sentences.chinese: 陸游詩南宋著名的愛國詩人。

sentences.english: Plum green glaze is a outstanding celadon glaze originated in Longquan Kiln in Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 梅子青是南宋龍泉窯創制的傑出青釉品種。

sentences.english: Burning fire dragon in Huanglongxi dated back to the Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 黃龍溪燒火龍起源於南宋時期。

sentences.english: Houcun was a famous poet of Ci in the late South Song.
sentences.chinese: 後村是南宋後期詞壇一大家。

sentences.english: Family Ritual was the Zhuxi's most influential book.
sentences.chinese: 《家禮》是南宋朱熹最有影響的禮學著作。

sentences.english: This kiln enamel, as it is called in a relatively short time, in southern song dynasty "near especially rare" has been recorded.
sentences.chinese: 此窯燒瓷時間較短，南宋時已有“近尤難得”記載。

sentences.english: As the government of the South Sung Dynasty stabilized, the bowmen were removed during the 4th year of Shaoxing.
sentences.chinese: 隨著南宋政權趨於穩定，紹興四年高宗罷廢新置弓手。

sentences.english: Southern Song Dynasty, to speak of a moon-phase gifts, take the meaning of reunion.
sentences.chinese: 南宋，民間以月餅相贈，取團圓之義。

sentences.english: Besides, the classic Night of Shen' s Gaden will bring you back to the Shouth Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 此外，沈園的古代之夜將把你帶回到南宋時代。

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Sima Xi took his wife Wenxiu to visit her parents, whose home in Xiling.
sentences.chinese: 南宋時期，司馬樨攜妻文秀拜訪岳父母，居西泠。

sentences.english: Then, the Song court was forced to move to Hangzhou as its imperial court because it could not push back the nomadic invaders.
sentences.chinese: 那時南宋朝廷不敵遊牧民族的進攻，被迫轉移到杭州。

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Sima Xi took his wife Wenxiu to visit her parents.
sentences.chinese: 南宋時期，司馬樨攜妻文秀拜訪岳父母。

sentences.english: In Northern song Dynasty Yu's Xiangzhouji was still preserved, while it was lost in Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 庾所作《湘州記》在北宋猶存於世，南宋時亡佚。

sentences.english: Four brilliant poets in Yongjia are members of a poetic school during the South Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “永嘉四靈”是南宋時期的一個詩歌流派。

definition: Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), founded by the Jurchen 女真[Nu:3 zhen1] people of North China, a precursor of the Mongol Yuan Dynasty
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
Tang of the Five Southern Dynasties 937-975
Song dynasty (960-1279)/used to distinguish it from 劉宋|刘宋 Song of Southern dynasties (420-479)
late Ming/first half of the 17th century
final years of Yuan dynasty (1279-1368)/mid 14th century
Zhao Gou, personal name of the tenth Song Emperor Gaozong 高宗[Gao1 zong1]
